website_summaries.verdict: Comfort meet style with this set of bar stools. Comes in a large number of color and pattern options to fit virtually any interior design style.
pros: A great deal of possible height adjustment using a single air-lift handle
Can slide up and down with a 10-inch range
cons: Padding under leather is less comfortable than other bar stools

website_summaries.verdict: Pair of modern chairs for a different look in the kitchen or home bar.
pros: We love how you get two chairs for the price of one
Unique leather pattern comes in different colors
Durable leather finished with multi-color possibilities
Height adjustable for different bars and tables
cons: Seats are on the smaller side for larger individuals

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and better than expected!
customer_reviews.text: Just received this stool set a few days ago. Was better than expected! Installation was very quick, takes literally minutes. Build quality is good. It's quite sturdy and stylish. The set looks like $80-100 each not $80 for both! I will update in a few months. But now I'm going to buy another set!
customer_reviews.author: CTN412

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your time and money
customer_reviews.text: Costumer service rep Shelly asked to delete my previous review with the promise to replace the defected bar stool, but after removing the review and many emails back and forth the only solution I was given was to purchase a new gas lift mechanism. I won't recommend this chairs because: 1. They have a very annoying squeak sound with side-to-side movement 2. They are dangerously unstable, they tipped over all the time. 3. Seats are too small, not comfortable at all. 4. Not sturdy, flimsy and wobbly.
customer_reviews.author: Uligo

customer_reviews.title: Great product/price/customer service.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased four of these stools. Great product! Arrived quickly. Easy to assemble (5 minutes each stool). Look great in kitchen and everything works as advertised. One seat was torn in shipping. Even this "problem" was as good an experience as you can expect. Customer Service at Leopard Outdoor Products was outstanding. Had a replacement seat within four days of notification. Problem solved. Seriously, this product for this price and this supplier are great.
customer_reviews.author: Merlin

customer_reviews.title: 1 chair showed up damaged
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 4 of these chairs. Everything about them is great except one of them came with a stain on the top. The other three are perfect. Gonna leave a 1 star review until I get this sorted out with the company. Update... just got the replacement cushion from the company, very happy. 5 stars!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Charles P.

customer_reviews.title: Quality control lacking, customer service found wanting
customer_reviews.text: We planned on ordering 10 of these. The first two came and the quality of the stitching was very poor enough for us to question the QA process in the factory churning these out (see image). Company offered to replace the defective item, which was appreciated, but in all reality they aren't that spectacular, so we passed. Working with customer service was very tedious. They dragged their feet on issuing a return label and wanted to do anything but allow us to return them. I had to get Amazon involved since they are 3rd party sellers. I've learned my lesson about the risks of buying from 3rd party sellers. You have been warned!
customer_reviews.author: J. Larsen

customer_reviews.title: Ease of Assembly, Good Looking
customer_reviews.text: These stools are really wonderful - they look good, they're comfortable, and they were easy to assemble. UPS banged up the box pretty badly (it was taped shut when I got it), so I worried that pieces might be missing, but the way these were packed, and the extra plastic and paper on all the pieces showed me that these would be good looking. Assembly was - as I said - really easy, requiring only the included allen wrench and following the directions. The seats adjusted perfectly (both up and down), and they really look good. I'm pleased with the product and will probably order two more.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Newton

customer_reviews.title: I knew I shouldn't have ......
customer_reviews.text: I was asked to take down my true feelings review 😂 that should tell u something
customer_reviews.author: Angehl

customer_reviews.title: These barstools were delivered on time and easy to build but they both came out crooked after ...
customer_reviews.text: These barstools were delivered on time and easy to build but they both came out crooked after building. The metal piece that screws into chair is defective and was shaped at a slant on both barstools.
customer_reviews.author: Roxie Rae

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble seat and back width is 14" not ...
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble seat and back width is 14" not 16". My chairs are two different ones, the padded and design is not symmetric and of course I also have a leaner like several other people. The one that is sitting upright instead of leaning presents itself well, the other is a true leaner and when you sit in it you swivel to the low side of the chair, these are defective or maybe one in every set is. A pain to return to they will have to go in the basement instead of at breakfast bar, when in doubt buy local .. sit on it .. touch it ... etc . etc.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff C.

customer_reviews.title: Not very stable
customer_reviews.text: Perhaps this would be fine for children nowhere near the maximum height, but I needed chairs for a bar-height countertop, which this claims to be. However, with my weight (nowhere near the maximum) at full height, the chair drops about 3-4 inches once you try to sit down. It also has quite a bit of wiggle when you shift your weight. The base doesn't have much support at all, so when you attempt to get off the chairs, it begins to fall forward. Very unstable and disappointing. Im going to keep these for a few days to see how they end up performing with regular use, but I'll likely try to return them.
customer_reviews.author: Jaime M.

customer_reviews.title: DON'T WASTE YOUR MONEY!
customer_reviews.text: The seats aren't as comfortable and a tad bit too small. The set up was fairly easy, however the seats don't seem to be adjustable, as mentioned in their title. I tried looking at a YouTube video, to ensure I had put it together correctly, after reading the instructions multiple times, however negative results. Overall, I'm super disappointed with this product. I'll probably give the chairs to my young nieces, for her tea parties or something of that sort. A HUGE waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: T. Frostt

customer_reviews.title: What quality?
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 sets. They have been in use for a week. Seat does not have memory to bounce back. Feels like sitting on wooden board. So not what we expected to happen - even at this price.
customer_reviews.author: Cali Blaze

customer_reviews.title: I received these chairs and one is great. The other one won't stay at the height ...
customer_reviews.text: I have been trying to reach the seller. I received these chairs and one is great. The other one won't stay at the height you leave it. It keeps rising up slowly once someone stops sitting on it. I haven't heard back from seller on if there is a fix for this or if I need to return. Please help!
customer_reviews.author: Pina Colada

customer_reviews.title: The good and the ugly side of these
customer_reviews.text: In all honesty these barstools are amazing, but there are some things to be aware of. I ordered four of them. Out of the four, one seat on the stool did not line up correctly with the screw base which is frustrating because I couldn’t get a forth screw in, that right away stays out as bad quality control. My body type is muscular 220lb but they are holding up well. If you want these I’d recommend them to you as 50/50 do it.
customer_reviews.author: Guy A

customer_reviews.title: Perfect barstool
customer_reviews.text: After looking forever for a light weight swivel barstool we finally found the perfect one. We are always cautious when purchasing furniture items on line but after reading the reviews, good & bad we decided the good far outweighed the few bad reviews. So very glad we did. Absolutely love these barstools. They are sleek, comfortable, light weight yet sturdy & look amazing. We purchased them in black but they do come in other colors. Loved how easy they were to put together as well. After looking for so long we are very happy and pleased with our purchase. Definitely recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: B Moyer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable but assembly needs work
customer_reviews.text: The seats themselves are super comfortable; however, the pre-drilled holes on the bottom of the chairs did not align properly which caused improper screwing and a mount of frustration. One chair, the screw isn’t all the way in, and on the other chair, I couldn’t get the 4th screw to tighten at all, so it’s missing a screw. If you’re wondering if I tightened any screws prior to getting all in first, the answer is no. It’s unfortunate, because I really do think they’re super comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: jsiL

customer_reviews.title: Nice bar stools.
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised at how nice these bar stools are at this price point. Simple, attractive modern look, comfortable, and very functional. The swivel movements are easy and smooth, as is the adjustment mechanism. The adjustment is via a stout gas shock absorber. The stools were well packaged and unboxing a breeze. Just be very careful with a knife blade when opening the top of the box. The assembly process was fast and simple. Clear instructions and only four bolts per stool. Everything you need is neatly packaged with the stools Total time to unbox and assemble both stools was 25 minutes, including the time to inventory the parts. I highly recommend the stools and the products from this company.
customer_reviews.author: R. McClusky

customer_reviews.title: Nice stools, but..... I can only use one
customer_reviews.text: Only one could be assembled because the second one has a faulty part. I’ve emailed them and hope they reply soon. I’ll update as soon as the problem is solved. They look great and I am anxious to use them. But it stinks because I paid extra for one day shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Walter

customer_reviews.title: Simple, inexpensive, good starter
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly, assembly was easy, and aesthetically simple and nice. But you do get what you pay for in the sense that they aren’t the sturdiest. The base is rather light and smaller than the sturdier swivel stools. I would not trust a young child or heavier than average person on them. Also the seat material is matte so any slight grease can be seen easily. But they do the job for now since we just moved in and have no other furniture.
customer_reviews.author: misdamina

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The chair adjustment mechanism doesn't work. Chairs are too short. Edit - company contacted me and told me to remove the cap from the mechanism, which I had already done. I took the top piece off and pressed down on the mechanism with the side of a screwdriver, this caused the mechanism to shoot up to the top and now I can't get it back down... not they're too tall, but more usable than before when they were far too short. I still don't think this is a quality product, but I increased the review to two stars for their customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Nate

customer_reviews.title: Great bar stools at a great price
customer_reviews.text: These bar stools are fantastic for the price. I use two of them in front of my AtGames Legends Ultimate arcade machine for more comfortable extended play. They look stylist and are well made. Everything under the chair is actual metal with the exception of a small plastic chrome ring that covers where the shaft meets the base. My only complaint is there is not much back support as the back is a bit far back and short. This is not an issue as these are for more active sitting and the back rest is only occasionally used in my application.
customer_reviews.author: John S. Kjellman

customer_reviews.title: Bar Stool with back
customer_reviews.text: I love these bar stools! They were so easy to put together! I actually got got 6 because I have a huge island and 2 were the wrong color. The company kindly sent me the correct cushions in the correct color right away. Problem solved. I ordered 2 more because I actually needed 8 of them. My kitchen is very large and these are so awesome. I have had so many compliments on how comfortable they are!!! I simply love them!!
customer_reviews.author: PMac

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but mine are defective
customer_reviews.text: The colour ia perfect, overall assembly is easy, one chair not all four holes lined up, it was defective, I tried multiple times to get them to line up, but the last bolt one go in because it's at an angle. The second chair was easier and quicker to assemble with all four bolts going in fine. Neither of the chairs abilities function to raise the seat work. They WILL NOT stay up. So I think both my chairs are defective. They're a few inches too short for my bar I'm making, so that's kind of a bummer the seats wont raise like they're supposed to
customer_reviews.author: Jasper Rodgers

customer_reviews.title: U get what u pay for.
customer_reviews.text: The plastic piece separating the two metal cylinders of the pump fell off the day I put them up. I thought it was just bad luck on one chair. A few days later, the same piece dropped from the second chair. The metal-to-metal grinding when you sit on it is unbearable. I’m returning them. Otherwise they’re ok for the price. U get what u pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Tea~Jay

customer_reviews.title: Love them, a child could assemble.
customer_reviews.text: First thing the husband said "what did you order now?' and you get everything. Literally five minutes later he is playing on it like a 3 year old in the barber chair. We both loved them. Comfy, good looking and the price was right. We are going to order 2 more, one to use and one as a spare. No, they are not super heavy but they feel good and not flimsy or cheap looking. Good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Auntie

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Bar Stools
customer_reviews.text: These bar stools are very comfortable and very good looking. They look expensive. Assembly was a little tricky, because one of the stools had a protective cover stuck inside of the long tube (leg) which was difficult to remove in order to complete assembly. Overall, the quality is very good for the price. I wish they made these in some nice cloth versions, which I think would last longer than these faux leather fabric, which I know will start to flake in a couple of years. I would purchase these again.
customer_reviews.author: AKP

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for breakfast bar.
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit concerned about quality and stability due to the price. I am pleasantly surprised. The assembly was very simple. The chairs are perfect for a breakfast bar. Very comfortable. Swivel. Foot rest. I do not think they would be comfortable for long term sitting. I also think that they would be uncomfortable for very large people.
customer_reviews.author: LadyShade

customer_reviews.title: Breaks quickly
customer_reviews.text: Like with all Chinese chairs nowadays, the weakness lies in the bottom bearing, and welding joints. They use lower quality steel, and the chair starts breaking easily at the bottom. We've bought 5 different models, one pair of these, and they lasted about 6 months to a year before creaking like crazy, and we had to retire them. At least the chair leatherette kept up for a year, but the chair probably works with people of 125LBS or less. For any decent person of 175LBS or more, this is not your chair!
customer_reviews.author: H B

customer_reviews.title: Nice but VERY lightweight and will shift around a lot
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for - these look nice, but they are EXTREMELY lightweight. I am concerned about our hardwood floors because they get shifted around whenever someone sits in them (even the cat). But they're quite comfortable, and for the price I guess I can't expect more. I wish there were a way to put some padding on the bottom to protect the floors (the base is circular and only the edges touch the floor), but we'll see how they hold up.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Light weight on the bottom makes for tilting over.
customer_reviews.text: These chairs are not heavy on the bottom so they fall over when someone small is getting off of them. My 4 year old tilts over bc of the weight difference. The fabric has already started hanging under the chair and I just built them 2 days ago. They are pretty but it’s for a house with only adults.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica E.

customer_reviews.title: Nice barstools for the money. Contemporary & sleek
customer_reviews.text: Nice addition to our game room. Not that substantial as far as size is concerned but they certainly do the job for the space I put them in. I had to buy six barstools for my kitchen and spent most of the money there from a very contemporary store. These work for the purpose intended and for the money I highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: DezHankins

customer_reviews.title: Cheap product - not worth it
customer_reviews.text: The stools aren’t sturdy and are cheap quality. I returned them within 20 days. The sellers are third party and I have been struggling to get my refund back from 2 months. To response what so ever. They grey chairs stained my new house - the pictures are from counter walls in my kitchen. In fact I should be compensated for my wall paint. Highly disappointed with the product and Amazon refund process.
customer_reviews.author: Shilpa

customer_reviews.title: ... sleek look at such an affordable price is just awesome! Just moved into a new house that has ...
customer_reviews.text: To have something of this quality and sleek look at such an affordable price is just awesome! Just moved into a new house that has a kitchen island and was thinking there was no way I could afford bar stools.. Then, I saw these. My Son and I are both over 6'2" and they are a tad on the small size but perfectly comfortable. Best part is, if someone ruins one of the 4 I bought, I can just reorder. Did I mention affordable? <3 <3 <3
customer_reviews.author: Kerry Warren

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, well built, look great.
customer_reviews.text: They look great for our evening events, so my guest and I are a bit above the audience for my interviews. Easy to put the pre-assembled parts together. The pneumatic height adjustment works perfectly. Large enough seats. Comfortable. My only drawback was that when at full height, as we use them, they swivel so easily they are a little awkward to get up onto. But, not a problem. Very well built. Good price. I recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Judy

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Before buying these seats like any other purchase on Amazon, I looked over the reviews. I saw that there were an abundance of good ratings 4 star or above which leads me to believe that these seats were going to be a great buy. I was wrong. These seats are not sturdy and I can't help but believe that the reviews for this product must have been influenced or falsified. I would not buy this product again. Sitting on them is like an ongoing balancing act.
customer_reviews.author: Roby1227

customer_reviews.title: Not heavy enough
customer_reviews.text: These are cheap barstools that look good, but functionally aren’t that great. I’ve had expensive barstools that looked similar to these, so maybe I expected too much. But these aren’t very stable at all. They’re way too light. Trying to sit on them can be a challenge without falling over if they’re set at a high height. And I’m not a very large person. I could probably tip them over with one finger. Although they’re cheap, I would invest a little more into ones that have a heavier base.
customer_reviews.author: Nakul

customer_reviews.title: Beware the Annoying Squeak
customer_reviews.text: These bar stools are easy to assemble and acceptably sturdy and solid and attractive. However, they squeak with side-to-side movement as well as the twirling movement. Simply leaning forward creates a nerve-grating squealing squeak. I use these bar stools at my sit/stand computer table. I am of average height and weight, and there are no children in my house. My point is, these bar stools do not and have not received heavy use, and they have not been mistreated in the many months I've owned them. They have squeaked since the first time I sat on them. Regrettably, I cannot recommend these chairs.
customer_reviews.author: Chimes at Midnight Reviews

customer_reviews.title: I Don’t Recomend these Seats
customer_reviews.text: I eventually need 6 seats so I ordered these as a test, and I’m glad I didn’t order all 6! After less than 3 months of normal use, one of the seats is starting to make grinding noise when twisting from left to right and vise versa. They have a cheap feel too.. You get what you pay for so don’t expect them to last. 1 Star from me and I recommend to avoid them!
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer 1.0

customer_reviews.title: The actual seat was beautiful everything else no good
customer_reviews.text: Item is very flimsy. I had trouble putting them together and disassembling. Pain in my butt. The actual seat was beautiful everything else no good!
customer_reviews.author: Steph Lake

customer_reviews.title: nice for the money
customer_reviews.text: These are nice I bought two then bought two more so I must like them. Not real sturdy they tip when a heavier person tries to get out of them. Love the option to make them different sizes so when eating at the snack bar they are tall but when we have visitors we put them to the lowest height and use them as a normal chair really do look expensive very easy to assemble took no more than 3 minutes
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie

customer_reviews.title: Two modern style soft pu leather & adjustable Bar stools.
customer_reviews.text: I love, love these bar stools. I chose orange to match my decor. I am so amazed at the color, price for two and how quickly and easily I put them together. It was like magic. They are comfortable, beautiful and soft to sit on. But most of all they are so elegant for my kitchen island. I plan to purchase more when I redo my N.Y. kitchen. These bar stools really make the room pop with style and color. What a great price and I got them so quickly. Keep making these elegant bar stools.
customer_reviews.author: corine356

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous Stools
customer_reviews.text: Man, do I love these stools!!! A perfect blend of practicality and contemporary for my kitchen. It only took 10 minutes to assemble both of them together and I love that I can adjust the height. In terms of how comfortable they are, I wouldn't sit in them for hours, but definitely better than sitting on hard wood.
customer_reviews.author: Wathan48

customer_reviews.title: these are the cheapest chairs on the planet - and that's good
customer_reviews.text: We have them dropped shipped to tradeshows so we don't have to pay the ridiculous show furniture rate. Then we leave them at the show. Mic drop. That's right. we just walk away. Happiest day of life. How China can manufacture, package, and ship these chairs to the USA, and then how we can ship them with Amazon Prime all over the USA. This is stupid. But as long as the wheel keeps turning, we will keep buying. Thanks China and Amazon for subsidized cheap chairs.
customer_reviews.author: hipturn

customer_reviews.title: Stylishly good value.
customer_reviews.text: I assembled these two barstools in only minutes. Maybe ten minutes all total. They look very stylish and are quite sturdy. They hold up to my just under 6 foot 250 pound frame without a problem. Well made. Good value.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Bowen

customer_reviews.title: Easy Assembly but very Wobbly
customer_reviews.text: They're easy to assemble. It took me less than 20 minutes to put both together. But they're extremely wobbly. It feels like I'm going to fall everytime I sit down on them. The lever where you adjust the height with is a tricky one. It doesn't feel very smooth and you sometimes have to play aroujd with it in order for it to work properly. They look beautiful though
customer_reviews.author: Genbon

customer_reviews.title: Value for Money
customer_reviews.text: These chairs are modern and look great in any space, the black and silver allows it to be pretty transferable between spaces. For me the chairs are fantastic, and function as expected! My brother in law is disappointed he can’t sit in them with the weight limit. He isn’t a fat guy, he is just 6’3 and has a muscle build so for him, he hates these chairs. We have had them for almost a year now and they look like they did when they arrived and they’ve been used every day. Great value for money!
customer_reviews.author: NESS_AUZ

customer_reviews.title: Defective Product!!! Lasted 1 day
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this set of 2 chairs. One of the chairs lasted 1 day and the lift mechanism failed and the chair dropped to the bottom. Lever no longer works to lift it. I've never had a product last 1 day. Stay away from this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: they are OK
customer_reviews.text: after waiting on this it was ok, its like pleather, not the best the base feels like plastic ad the leader is cheap, if you don't like then you have to pay 17$ to return back being a prime member its BS but not worth the money at all Wal-Mart has nicer ones and they seat taller... I did not return the other 2 because I already build them.
customer_reviews.author: Juan santiago

customer_reviews.title: Durability.
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these chairs and I'm a firm believer in you get what you pay for so I should've known that 2 chairs for that price wasn't a great idea. With in a few months one chair had broken to the point I had to put it in my garage hoping to be able to get a replacement. I contacted the seller but they never even responded. it's best to spend a few extra dollars for quality. Trust me these chairs will not last more than a year.
customer_reviews.author: LuvaFace

customer_reviews.title: Returning will cost you
customer_reviews.text: These bar stools are too short and not stable for sitting at my kitchen bar (even after measuring before purchasing). Unfortunately, they charge you over $20 per shipment to send them back (four chairs almost $50) I am now stuck with four bar stools that will not work in my home. As a prime member I am very disappointed with Amazon. I have never been charged to send items back. Beware of your purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kacey Folger

customer_reviews.title: Awful
customer_reviews.text: I should have read all the reviews - the chairs are not worth one dollar. They are extremely unstable, the legs don't reach the metal feet rest area as they are too small (I am a normal 5'7 height woman), the seat is tiny and it wobbles. Trying to return is an absolute nightmare with the seller barely replying with the same sentence to provide picture of defect.
customer_reviews.author: Irina T

customer_reviews.title: All good
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting something that would do fine for my workbench. This was at least one solid notch above what I was expecting in every respect. Assembly was easy. The foot rest swivels with the seat. Even though the seat just sits on top, when I pick it up by the seat, the bottom doesn't fall off. Bottom line is that it is just better than what I was expecting for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price but not for those over 140 lbs.
customer_reviews.text: For the price it's a great bar stool set; however, keep in mind if you are over 140 pounds I would consider another bar stool set, as this one is pretty small. Like the other reviewers say- it seems kid sized but they will do until I get some really nice pricey bar stools. It's easy to put together, but the enter sitting area seemed damaged as it is buckled. I'm also quite sure the online description of the the product's dimensions are incorrect. They do looks nice- like real leather.
customer_reviews.author: SAM

customer_reviews.title: Ok seats, cant dissasemble
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy seats, don't drop much even with me being 220lbs. Seats were too narrow for my liking. Box came with holes in it but no major damage to the chairs themselves. Disassembly is extremely difficult following the vague instructions provided. Actually broke one stool while trying to unlock the bottom clip to take it apart. Threw them away and went with another company.
customer_reviews.author: Robert M.

customer_reviews.title: Not comfortable, tips easily.
customer_reviews.text: Due to the shape of the seat of the chair, it doesn't support your lumbar area and pushes your hips forward making you spend you sit in this chair awkwardly adjusting your position every few minutes. Don't lean too far in any direction or the chair will tip. There is no weight to the base. Overall looks good. If you only want it for looks, it would be great.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Marie Benson

customer_reviews.title: Solid and Nice Looking
customer_reviews.text: This is second purchase of these pairs of chairs . They look quite nice and can be assembled in 10 min. I weigh 275 and they work well for me. They are not for EVERYDAY use in a bar or office though or the leather will fail. We use them at church for the teachers and the safety and soundbooth operators so they are used 2=3 hours a week and we love them. They are nicely padded fo a couple hours sitting and when we need more these will be our choice!! 4 stars because not for everyday use!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: We love these!
customer_reviews.text: These chairs have been great, they were easy to assemble and have held up a long time. I also appreciate that they were able to ship to my location as a lot of furniture and big items like this usually won’t ship to me. They were a great price too and look great in my kitchen island. We don’t even sit at our dining table and prefer to eat at our island on these instead!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality bad communication with seller for issues.
customer_reviews.text: We bought 2 sets. The first box, one of the chair seats was defective. It leans. It is the seat itself that bows on the bottom so when you put it together it doesn’t screw on flat. I’ve sent 3 messages in Amazon to the seller and still no response in over 2 weeks. I thought the chairs would be better made. Feels cheap but I like the looks.
customer_reviews.author: Angela V. Martin

customer_reviews.title: Cute and easy to assemble, but dangerous.
customer_reviews.text: So it was very easy to assemble. Also they look pretty nice and the material feels as good as I hoped. That being said the bases aren't weighted making these very unstable. One of our stools tips over forward with any weight sitting on it. The other is a bit more stable but just sorta slowly rotates you to one side when you sit on it. You can help this a little by sinking it to it's lowest height, but that defeats the point of having an adjustable height stool. I would never use this without a counter to lean on. That would be pretty dangerous.
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these from my new home. They fit perfectly for my island kitchen counter. The style, the color and the comfort are all great! They feel really good and very easy to assemble. I had minor issues with some defective parts but when I contacted the company they sent replacement parts right away. I would recommend these products to anybody and they are not too pricey either! Great Buy!
customer_reviews.author: Samnang Sophal

customer_reviews.title: good buy
customer_reviews.text: came as described nothing wrong with them all parts were there and accounted for...no rips, or scratches...i do however wish they were just a little bigger but they still work great...and they can so far hold higher weights...but i do recommend not raising the chair to high if you are a heavy person or you will probably fall over haha...or break it one or the other lol...would recommend
customer_reviews.author: nate

customer_reviews.title: More stable the lower they are
customer_reviews.text: I bought these stools for my husband's guitar room. We used them as bar stools at nearly full extension. We noticed that the higher the are, the less stable they are because the bases are too lightweight. Having said that, they are good looking, comfortable and will serve as good armless stools for guitar playing. I am happy with the purchase--good stools for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Attractive, but uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.text: These bar stools were inexpensive, very attractive and easy to assemble, but they simply are not comfortable for sitting for any length of time. I am short, so I need a high stool to eat meals at our kitchen island. The height can be adjusted, but there is no comfortable place to rest ones' feet. The seat is not deep enough to sit back, and the position of the back pushes one forward, so I kept sliding off.
customer_reviews.author: B. G. Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Sauve AF, Comfy, Cheap and Just What Your Bar Needs
customer_reviews.text: I needed cheap, good-looking bar stools. My boyfriend said these look like they're from the 80's and they're not his favorite. HOWEVER, despite his lame opinion, I love them and so does everyone else who stops by our place. They're adjusting feature is great, you can make them comfortable whatever your height. They were easy to assemble, they're easy to clean and they've held up really well over the last 6 months. If you want a sauve look with actual comfort, these bad boys are a winner.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These stain
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love these. They were easy to put together and look good....until you use them. These were sat on and immediately got stained from people's clothing (not even new clothes) and it will NOT come off. I ordered special cleaner and everything. There are also pieces falling apart on these. I'm going to try to return them. I've had them less than a week and a half, and with the stains and parts coming out, you'd think i'd had them for years.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Wisniewski

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service.
customer_reviews.text: I had a problem with the first set of chairs and customer service was excellent and that's why I'm giving them 4 stars. They offered me 20% refund, but I liked the chairs so much that I ordered 2 more with 20% off, I have 6 in all now.The chairs are beautiful and for the price there great. The base are a little small and that makes them unstable, just be careful and you will be ok. I would recommend these chairs.
customer_reviews.author: Tnice

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy this crap.
customer_reviews.text: If you are prone to violence this is not for you. This is one of the most frustrating experiences I’ve had kind of simple simple stool. 1st went together ok. The threading was misaligned, but still able to work with it. The second one is worse and I’ve spent 1 hour on a single bolt. I’ll buy American Next time.
customer_reviews.author: P. G.

customer_reviews.title: Its.. okay
customer_reviews.text: Received product 3 days late and the box looked like it had been through a storm to get here. I was okay after the first install, but the during the second, I noticed that the base was dented up. I really don't want to go through the process of shipping pieces back... but I would like a partial refund.
customer_reviews.author: Marcus

customer_reviews.title: Great and easy kitchen bar stools!!!
customer_reviews.text: When I received the stools I was surprised at how heavy the box was, came as a pair. I needed something small that would fit multiple bar height counters since I was going to be moving around. I found these and bought them, assembly was super easy and they were very sturdy. What is so cool about these is that I can use them at different heights and for different folks. Great buy perfect for city dwellers in condo's!!
customer_reviews.author: Denny

customer_reviews.title: Sharp Silver Color
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with purchase. Great silver color. Like the waffle weave look. Stitching good. Base shiny and dusts up easily. Good rubber tread on bottom of base. Make sure you read instructions carefully regarding the black cap when putting together. Ended up getting 4 total for our kitchen bar. Comfortable enough for a meal and sitting 2-3hrs. Can tip easily if children play on them. We are using them on a hard wood floor not carpeting.
customer_reviews.author: Laura L. McBrayer

customer_reviews.title: You can NOT go wrong with these!
customer_reviews.text: I like everything about them. They were easy to put together and they look and feel like they cost a ton more. I use mine for work. I had a different type of high seating and noticed that I had back pain all the time. No more, not with these beauties! If you are on the fence, take the leap. You will not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: A 1 LADY

customer_reviews.title: If you need bar stools look no further!
customer_reviews.text: For the price these stools offer incredible value. While looking for similar products I was finding ONE stool for the price of this 2 pack. Is there a reason the other ones are more expensive? Sure. Perhaps they’re made of better material. However, upon assembling and using these for over two weeks I can’t be any happier! They look phenomenal. They were easy to assemble. The seats are large and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: SPTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: JUNK!!! DON'T BUY!!! STAR RATING IS MISLEADING.
customer_reviews.text: These bar stools are cheap junk. Assembly would have been easy if the screw holes were aligned. They weren't and it was very hard to get the seat attached. The screws also strip easily. I made it work but I'm not sure how long they'll hold. Not very comfortable either. Surprised this item had such a high rating.
customer_reviews.author: P. McKinnon

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together at home, tho one of my bottom ring pieces on one stool came smashed to bits, but luckily it was just a cosmetic piece and looks ok without it. Hate trying to hassle with pieces unless I actually need it for the product and it was the cheap plastic ring. Probably due to handling. I had the chairs put together in less than 15 minutes they look great
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not the best you can get, but pretty good for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Not to shabby. They work great, and are pretty comfy. The seat and back are pretty flat. A little more contour would be nice. But for what I paid for them, I am happy. Got these for a Super Bowl party. Had them for a little over a month and they are holding up. Assembly was not to hard. A few screws and sliding some pieces together and done. Just remember to remove the cap on the gas tube.
customer_reviews.author: Ginger Fawson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent price, easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to assemble, my 15 year old did both chairs 8n less than 20 mins!!! Very happy with my purchase, excellent price. I will note that the seat is not as wide as i would like but still good, the chairs are very lite in weight so i was worried at first but it's been holding up great! I would recommend these chairs.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit worried about these chairs after seeing some reviews, but I was pleasantly surprised that both chairs were even and I won’t have to return them. I gave 4 stars, only because of what looks like a dent in the side of the chair cushion and how they wobble on my floor. But it’s not really a big deal, they get the job done and are sturdy so I’m happy.
customer_reviews.author: Azaria B.

customer_reviews.title: Rating Correction - confused by star rating system
customer_reviews.text: Love them! Perfect, attractive kitchen stools match my kitchen. Lowest height perfect for short me to cook & stir at stove. Sturdy stool but light weight so be a little careful. Easy to pull back & forth without floor marks. A little leather cleaner made easier to slide on & off. Swivel super convenient. Packed well. One, easy to ignore, small scratch. Simple to put together.
customer_reviews.author: myrna hedrick

customer_reviews.title: Don’t forget to take the cap off the lift before assembly
customer_reviews.text: Really love these stools. I’m over 200 pounds and was nervous they would be uncomfortable or too small but they’re a great size and comfortable. My only warning is make sure you take the cap off the air lift, once you put it fully together and the height feature doesn’t work. I missed that in the directions for one of them but otherwise they’re amazing stools for a great price
customer_reviews.author: Chelsi Donnelly

customer_reviews.title: Very Decent Stools!
customer_reviews.text: These are great. The color is a little off, and they don’t feel overly strong, but also not overly weak, if that makes sense. We have used them every day, for a few months now, and they have held up just fine - especially for the price! We put an Amazon rug under them as they left some minor marks on the wood floor, but no big deal at all, as my daughter and wife probably slide them around a little too much.
customer_reviews.author: RAH!

customer_reviews.title: Top-heavy!
customer_reviews.text: These are pretty top-heavy but they were easy to assemble, look decent, and my kids love them, which is the important part. I don't think I would trust them with a small child on them--mine are 12 and 14, so they aren't wiggling around while they eat or do their homework. They wipe down nicely and the mechanism works smoothly. They are low enough to sit comfortably at my standard height kitchen counter and tall enough to sit comfortably at our chest-level kitchen bar.
customer_reviews.author: bcsus83

customer_reviews.title: Comfy to sit on, high enough, appears to be good quality materials so far
customer_reviews.text: Some people mentioned it was squeaky and/or uncomfortable to sit on. I found mine to be quiet and comfy, it might be a bad batch that some others got? I do want to note that they should not be used around children - they ARE easy to flip. I am an adult living alone, so I don't have that danger but if you have little ones, might wanna opt for more heavy/sturdy options.
customer_reviews.author: Vika

customer_reviews.title: Cute Chairs
customer_reviews.text: The chair were so easy to put together everything you need including the tools are in the box. It will literally take you 10 min for the first chair and 5 mins for the others. The chair is really classy but light in weight. I have not had them long enough to give a true review so I will come back in a few months.
customer_reviews.author: Reci Bella

customer_reviews.title: NOT STURDY AT ALL
customer_reviews.text: Fairly easy assembly and they look nice but they do not feel sturdy AT ALL!! They are very top heavy and I'm nervous for my guests to sit on them! I feel like I'm going to have to warn everyone that attempts to sit on them! I definitely don't feel comfortable with my children on them even with me right by them! We really need the extra seating for a party we are having but I'd love to send them back!!
customer_reviews.author: TEXAS

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Worth Getting
customer_reviews.text: I bought these 4 of these to replace the wooden chairs that originally came with the dining table I have. I am very pleased with these bar stools. They are made of good steady materials and easy to put together. I love the all metal base, adjustable and rotating chairs. They tuck neatly under the dining table like a regular chair, which puts them out of the way when not used.
customer_reviews.author: Mary L.

customer_reviews.title: Look nice, but degraded in stability quickly
customer_reviews.text: They do look really nice, and to be fair, they have been "Well-used" by my kids, but we've only had them for a few months and one of them already squeaks when barely touched, and the other is not much different. They still WORK, but it's not pleasant to use them now, and we will be replacing them soon.
customer_reviews.author: Lael Beckwith

customer_reviews.title: A must buy!
customer_reviews.text: These are wonderful and very sturdy besides being quite eye catching and stylish they are very easy to assemble and well made the swivel action is smooth as is the lift feature. I am 6' 2" and weigh 220 lbs and they support me fine I am so glad that I found these and I definitely recommend this product. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Jef Girard

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable Bar Stools
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: This review has been updated to 4 stars after receiving a missing part that was not initially shipped. These bar stools are a solid buy, easy to put together and very comfortable. I love that these include a footrest and a gas lift to customize the height. My biggest negative feedback would be that the chairs are quite light and that the base should be a bit heavier to make the bar stools more stable. Also, the package was initially missing the gas lifts but customer service was very responsive and shipped me the missing parts within a week. However, overall I'm happy with this purchase and would recommend these bar stools to anyone looking for great value.
customer_reviews.author: Asad S

customer_reviews.title: Chairs are two months old and they are already tearing ...
customer_reviews.text: Chairs are two months old and they are already tearing and squeaking. Quality is quite low and I wish I could return them.
customer_reviews.author: Russell Collins

customer_reviews.title: Broke while sitting in it after not even a month
customer_reviews.text: Chair fell apart and broke when we sat in it. I'm pregnant so this could have resulted in serious injury so I'm extremely upset. Contacted customer services and they refused to refund me even with the scary situation that happened. Strongly don't recommend. I'm only 125lbs so this should not have been an issue
customer_reviews.author: Nadia

customer_reviews.title: Don’t
customer_reviews.text: Cheaply made, mine came with a tear never got the replacement, uncomfortable and not what I thought it would be. Invest more as you get what you pay for. Cheap and cheap. Cheap price cheap quality. I need to buy 2 more real barstool so I basically waisted money.
customer_reviews.author: Karthik Shetty

customer_reviews.title: No need to hire someone to assemble these
customer_reviews.text: Amazon offers a service to assemble these which is quite expensive, but you don't need it. They assemble easily and the only tool you need is provided. If you don't want to do it yourself you could pay a neighbor kid to do it. Good looking chairs, very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Bhakta Jim

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble, but came with blemishes
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking and easy to assemble. However, upon close inspection, the seats appear to have small defects in the material (maybe a tiny hole in one?) and the material gets dirty VERY easily. Would not recommend white if you have animals and/or children.
customer_reviews.author: Kashla

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Looks great! Feels great! Awesome buy! And it is good quality for the price! Only reason not 5 stars is because there was minor scratches on base plate maybe from delivery but really no big deal, there still very stylish stools. Well worth the price
customer_reviews.author: Sam Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Too pricey.
customer_reviews.text: These are easy to assemble. So far they hold up my boyfriend who is 6’4 and 280 Pounds. However I don’t expect them to hold him for very long, as they don’t seem very sturdy. They look like barber shop chairs. The price point was too high for me to feel really pleased with these chairs.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Malave

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Chairs are easy to put together, well packaged, excellent to sit in, they go up high and the force it takes to compress the chair back down is rather cumbersome However not in a negative way more like in a longevity way. I’m 170 lbs man and it goes down nice and slow which won’t take your breathe away like on an elevator... my daughter is 55 lbs and I let her hold a 3 lb weight which was cute... and it never would go down. Damn good info there folks I like it and will update this is any issues. P.s I have an issue: just seen on amazon the same chair $30 cheaper lol
customer_reviews.author: Mike,tn

customer_reviews.title: After a long search, these are the best in all categories.
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and good looking. The chairs are not big and clumsy. They are light and easy to move without being too light and unstable. I love being able to rotate to look out the back door at our bird feeders and back again at our breakfast.
customer_reviews.author: The Wife

customer_reviews.title: Dont last
customer_reviews.text: Dont waste your money. Spend that little bit more on some better chairs. I got these to replace some old worn out broke ones. But these havent even lasted a year. The "leather" is ripping and they squeak so badly it gives you a complex. They look great and all but thats all they're good for.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Robbins

customer_reviews.title: Better than anticipated, pleasant surprise
customer_reviews.text: Definitely was impressed with elegance and quality of these stools easy to assemble work great get many compliments on these stools , and a great value when I said was easy to assemble my better half had them together and working in 5 minutes each took longer to get them out of the box ! They’re well packaged .
customer_reviews.author: tattoowarrior69Top Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: For short people
customer_reviews.text: Eh. The product itself is about 4 stars. They were a snap to put together. The seat however, is not comfortable if you are long legged. I am 5'9" and inseam is 32, and the seat became very uncomfortable after sitting down for 10 minutes. Also, the foot rest needs to be higher.
customer_reviews.author: Kerry Bradley

product_meta.title: Modern Square PU Leather Adjustable Bar Stools with Back,Set of 2,Counter Height Swivel Stool by Leopard (Black)
feature_bullets: SOLD BY LEOPARD PRODUCTS is the real Bar stools. With a built in 360° swivel; High density foam upholstered in black faux leather; Constructed with polished chrome base and footrest
Easily adjusts from counter to bar height from 21.5in to 31.5in high, Air-lift handle for easy height adjustment
Modern Style and truly comfortable bar stool to bring you a comfortable sitting experience
Ideal kitchen bar stools for use in kitchen or dining area, all parts and instructions included
Dimension: 16" W x 15" D x 21.5"-31.5"H; Seat back dimension: 14.5”W x 12” H; Cushion dimension: 16”W x 15” D; Chrome base diameter 15.15"
NOTE : The bar stools are for adult,if there are children in your house,please pay attention to it,don't let them Climb the bar stool.Maybe it will tip over if the child climb it

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars2,811 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
